admin/digital-river.title: Digital River
admin/digital-river.settings.digitalRive: Enter your Digital River API secret key
admin/digital-river.settings.vtexAppToke: Enter a VTEX app key and token pair for this account. If you are configuring a marketplace-seller relationship, use a key and token that have permissions for all related accounts.
admin/digital-river.settings.isLive.help: Disable to use test mode, enable for production mode; make sure to use the appropriate token for the selected mode.
admin/digital-river.settings.enableTaxCa: Activate Digital River in checkout as your tax calculator. WARNING: Make sure to test checkout after changing this setting.
admin/digital-river.taxStatus.otherTaxCo: (Disabled because another tax provider is already configured)
admin/digital-river.saveSettings.failure: Error saving settings (see console for details)
